actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for recovery by the United States of the cost of medical care and services, and for other purposes.
short_title: Medical Care Cost Recovery Amendments of 1991

summary.text: Medical Care Cost Recovery Amendments of 1991 - Extends permanently the authority of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to recover from third party insurance providers the cost of medical care and services furnished by the Department of Veterans Affairs for a non-service-connected disability to veterans who have a service-connected disability and are covered under a health-plan contract. Revises the definition of "health-plan contract" to provide that Medicare supplemental insurance plans shall be required to reimburse the Department for services provided to veterans by the Department under such a plan.
